title: Backfirewall_
description:
Backfirewall_ is a first-person tragicomic adventure that takes place inside a smartphone. As the update assistant, you hold the fate of the System in your hands. Will you counter the update and save the chatty operating system OS9 from deletion? Begin a humorous escapade through various areas of the phone and solve clever puzzles. SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake
Meet colorful apps that inhabit the smartphone and have their own opinions about their boss, the update, and the godlike user. Review terminal errors in RAM, party in the Speakersâ€™ exclusive nightclub , navigate through the Wi-Fi bureaucracy, and explore other areas of a smartphone.

system_requirements.Processor: AMD FX-6100 / Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: AMD Radeon HD7750, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or Equivalent
